subject: Soccer
Vans
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: For years when the United States men’s and women’s soccer teams convene for training camps, the players have rolled up in rented vans, almost always driven by a teammate.
snippet: For years when the United States men’s and women’s soccer teams convene for training camps, the players have rolled up in rented vans, almost always driven by a teammate.
